page.title: 17Dock Farm...Rose Bank.
page.content:
Dock Farm (cont) Mr. Wooster lets out some of his land to neighbourly farmers nearby.
Rose Bank is a small holding belonging to Mrs.Dorothy Brock,a niece of Mr.Wooster.The house was built in 1958 and is made of brick with metal window frames. Mrs.Brock keeps 8 Jacobs sheep,a ram and several lambs aswell.The wool is good for hand spinning.She also has 20 Chevoit Cross ewes. In her garden she has an aviary with gold,silver and reeves pheasants,Lady amathust pheasant and 2 quails.Two peacocks and peahen,2 dogs,2 donkeys also live there.
